about_the_game:
Bonnie Blob in Shapeville Soundtrack 🎶

Get ready to bounce, giggle, and groove with the official Bonnie Blob in Shapeville soundtrack—now available on Steam! Designed for kids, this cheerful collection features upbeat and playful tunes from all four interactive storybooks:

- Bonnie's Day Trip 🚗 – Journey through lively melodies that capture the joy of exploration and friendship.

- Bonnie's Birthday 🎂 – Celebrate with party-perfect songs that sparkle with excitement and laughter.

- The Quest for the Missing Puzzle Piece 🧩 – Enjoy adventurous tunes filled with curiosity and discovery.

- Bonnie's Day at the Beach 🏖️ – Relax to sun-soaked rhythms and splashes of fun!

Whether you’re looking to relive moments from the game or simply want a playful soundtrack for little ears, these happy, easy-to-love tracks will have everyone in the family humming along! 🌈
